sentences.en: She liked necklaces made of turquoise, and long pendant earrings.

sentences.en: They aren't the best turquoise in the world - but they are real.

sentences.en: They said it was a very pretty light green or turquoise color.

sentences.en: Turquoise and steel are not dominant over each other.
sentences.cn: 蓝绿色和铁锈色对彼此而言都不是显性基因.

sentences.en: Turquoise, steel and royal blue are called the three iridescent colors.
sentences.cn: 蓝绿色, 金属色及皇家蓝色被称做三闪光色.
